name: The Ultimate The Pussycat Dolls Quiz |   Music

questions.text: How long was Carmit Bachar a member of the band for?
questions.explanation:
13 years.

	She joined in 1995 and left in 2008. She was born in Los Angeles. She worked as an international gymnast for ten years. She left the group after, "When I Grow Up" to pursue a solo career.

questions.text: Which member recorded a song called, "White Lies" with Paul Van Dyk?
questions.explanation:
Jessica.

	Jessica Lynn Sutta was born in Miami, Florida on May 15th, 1982. She has two older brothers, Bill and Kevin.She joined The Pussycat Dolls in 2002.She has also recorded a song called, "Make it Last" by Dave Aude. Her solo song is called "If I was a man."

questions.text: Who won 'The Pussycat Dolls Present: Search for the Next Doll'?
questions.explanation:
Asia Nitollano.

	Asia was 18 when she won. She dropped out after a week, deciding to pursue a solo career instead. She has a daughter. She is said to have won for her unique style, because Melissa Ryes, the first runner up, was said to resemble Nicole too much.

4.

	In the second of the season of 'The Pussycat Dolls Present', called 'The Pussycat Dolls Present: Girlicious', Robin Antin was looking for three girls to make a girl group called Girlicious. In the finale, it was revealed that Girlicious would have four members.

questions.text: Which of the following singles debuted at number one in the Russian Airplay Chart?
questions.explanation:
Hush Hush.

	The Pussycat Dolls are one of four American artists to have a single to debut at number one on the Russian Airplay Chart. 'Hush Hush' was released on their second album, 'Doll Domination'. 'Don't cha' was a worldwide single, but it made it only to number 36 on the Russian Airplay Chart.

questions.text: Who did the Pussycat Dolls collaborate with for the single, "Whatcha Think About That"?
questions.explanation:
Missy Elliot.

	They collaborated with Busta Rhymes for 'Don't Cha', with Snoop Dogg for 'Bottle Pop' and 'Buttons' and with will.i.am for 'Beep'.

Honolulu.

	Her mother, Rosemary, was of Hawaiian-Russian descent. Nicole was born on June 29th, 1978. She is the oldest of the Dolls. She was formerly a member of Eden's Crush. She was raised in Louisville, Kentucky.

September 14th, 1981.

	She joined the group in 2001. She was born in Phoenix, Arizona.  Ashley has also recorded a solo song called, 'Played'.

Flexy Doll.

	She is also known as Kim.Kimberly Kaye-Wyatt was born on February 4th, 1982 in Warrensburg, Missouri. She has visited most of Southern Europe. She began dancing at the age of 7. Ashley is known as Angel Doll, Melody is known as Baby Doll, Jessica is known as Pin-up Doll, Carmit was known as the Foxy Doll and Nicole is known as Queen Doll.

questions.text: Who is the youngest member of the group?
questions.explanation:
Melody.

	Nicole is the oldest and Melody, (born September 28th, 1984) is also known as Baby Doll, because she is the youngest member of the group. She was born in Arizona. She became a member of the group in 2003. She provides the lead vocals next to Nicole.
